Pro's:
- Amazing game mechanics that are easy to understand but hard to perfect and lead to a great game in a professional setting
- Longevity/replayability (most players end up with over 2000 hours in the game)
- All in game purchases are purely cosmetics so no pay to win. 
- Map updates and balancing changes are done ... semi often.

Con's:
- 64 tick MM servers and an outdated ranked system is really the biggest issue. You can always play ESEA/FACEIT but for new players they will really struggle. 
- outdated anti cheat. (Again ESEA/FACEIT is a fix)

8.5/10
